attributes.action: Use the British Antarctic Territory as a prison colony
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We think that prison sentances are not tough or cool enough and believe that murderers and rapists should be sent to a baron wasteland where they just have to fight for the rest of their lives like on the film 'No Escape'.
It would be way more brutal.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
